name: Revelations: The Chronicles of Jericho Fox
blurb: This game will merge both Egyptian and biblical testaments into a story driven third person shooter.

rewards.reward: You will get a free downloadable Original Cover art from Awakening Episode 1 with the artist signature.

[Added Awards:]
(1.) A free digital download of the Awakening Episode 1 (Once the game is ready for release).
(2.) A wallpaper concept art of Jericho fighting a demon corpse with artist signature.
3. Your name added to the credits section of Awakening Episode 1.

All Previous Tiers
[Added Awards:]
(1.) The Awakening Prototype (Beginning of August)
(2.) Digital Download Package of Awakening: Episode 1 Story Board Cinematic Intro Concepts.

All Previous Tiers

[Added Awards:]
(1.) T.T.O.R Survival Prototype (Release late this Fall)
(2.) C.O.F.J Awakening Poster 11.24 x 17.3

All Previous Tiers

[Added Awards:]
(1.) Revelation C.O.J.F Standard O.S.T
(2.) Your name added to a special section on our studio site (Coming Soon late this Summer) to show how thankful we are.

All Previous Tiers

[Added Awards:]
(1.) A Choice Between 2 Revelation T-Shirts (1.Revelation logo) and (2. Jericho Insignia)
(2.) C.O.J.F: Environment Art Wall Paper Pack (5 Original Concept Art)

All Previous Tiers

[Added Awards:]
(1.) Bonus Melee Weapon Package (4 weapons added to T.T.O.R Survival Alpha) (Will only be seen in C.O.F.J Episode 2) 
(2.) Deluxe C.O.J.F O.S.T w/ Cover art Signed by Scott Graves and Bonus Tracks.

(Previous Tiers that were added in the $5 Tier, $10 Tier, $35 Tier, and $55 Tier)

[Added Awards:]
(1.) Signed The Beast Alpha and Omega Poster 11.24 x 17.3 Signed by all members. 

(2.) Bonus Long Range Weapon package (4 new weapons added to T.T.O.R Survival Alpha) (Will only be seen in C.O.F.J Episode 2)

(Previous Tiers that were added the $5 Tier, $10 Tier, $35 Tier, and $55 Tier, and $75 Tier)

[Added Awards:]
(1.) Your name will be inscribe on the walls of the Horde feature called, "Protecting the Hall of Prayers (P.T.H.P)," that will be with C.O.F.J: Episode II
(2.) Digital Downloadable Media Art Booklet signed by the team.

Jericho Fox - Package 

(Previous Tiers added in $35 dollars on Up)

[Added Awards:]
(1.) A free digital download of the Awakening Episode 1
(2.) All Prototypes and additional access to the Horde feature prototype (Released next Fall)
(3.) You will all so receive the Wadjet of Ra Book Bag (Limited depending on Tier)

Horus - Package 

(Previous Tiers added in $35 dollars on Up)

[Added Awards:]
(1.) English Gent 7 inch Stainless Steel Figurine (Limited depending on Tier)

Seth - Package 

(Previous Tiers added in $35 dollars on Up)

[Added Awards:]

(1.) You will Automatically become a N.P.C character in C.O.F.J.  Each person will be feature in different episode. (EITHER ACTIVE OR DEAD)
(2.) Create a custom weapon (Melee or Long Range) that you want in the game with a description of it's special ability. MUST BE REASONABLE AND HAS TO GO WITH THE EGYPTIAN MYTHOLOGY THEME OF OUR PROJECT. (March 2014)
(4.) C.O.J.F: Awakening Seth Laptop Skin

Ra - Package 

(Previous Tiers added in $35 dollars on Up)

[Added Awards:]


(1.) You will Automatically become a N.P.C character in C.O.F.J.  Each person will be feature in different episode. (EITHER ACTIVE OR DEAD)

(2.) Create a custom weapon (Melee or Long Range) that you want in the game with a description of it's special ability. MUST BE REASONABLE AND HAS TO GO WITH THE EGYPTIAN MYTHOLOGY THEME OF OUR PROJECT. (March 2014)

(3.) Create your own monster implemented into C.O.J.F: The Treasures of Ra (T.T.O.R) Survival Feature and Protect the Halls of Prayers (P.T.H.P) Horde Feature. MUST BE REASONABLE AND HAS TO GO WITH THE EGYPTIAN MYTHOLOGY THEME OF OUR PROJECT. (July 2014)

(4.) Have your Name shown for all to see in the Hall of Prayers engrave on a The Wall of Elites. (July 2014)

(5). Both Revelation T-shirts.

(6.) Become an alternate playable character for each C.O.J.F: Feature (August 2014)
